attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of waisting money on youth centers that don't work why not pay for something that kids are really going to enjoy and participate in . After all if the youth centers have not got enough money for pool tables and what not , what is the price of a football ? £5 or £10 ! There are plenty of underused playing fields in this country and giving this country its national sport to children will also give them their much needed exercise and self discipline ! So why not scrap the failing youth centers and pay for a football and a part time coach ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
